page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: Nichola,age 7,lives in a house with 15 rooms,6 upstairs & 8 downstairs.There are 4 bedrooms,1 bathroom & a toilet upstairs,while downstairs there is a sitting room with coal fire,a lounge with TV & gas fire,a dining room,a utility room with cracks in the ceiling & walls,and a large kitchen fitted with modern kitchen units. James,age 7,lives in a house originally built as stables for the horses used for pulling barges on the canal.The house is built over the entrance to the 'mile tunnel'.It was converted from stables into two small cottages,numbers 45 & 47 Station Rd,so called because the railway used to run along the bottom of the street.
